column1: Table 1.1a: Annual Mean Concentrations of PM10 in the UK at roadside monitoring sites, 1997 to 2018
1. Annual means from individual monitoring sites are included if at least 75% data capture is achieved for the year concerned.
2. The annual mean for 'All Sites' in a given year is the mean average of all sites included in the table for that year.
3. The bounds of the 95% confidence interval can be obtained by adding/subtracting the values in column D from those in column C. This obtains the upper/lower bound respectively.
